## ValidEnumTypeRuleOptions interface

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Options for the valid-enum-type rule.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ValidEnumTypeRuleOptions 
```

## Remarks

This rule validates `@enumType` TSDoc tag usage on enum declarations and string literal union type aliases.

</td><td>


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

**_(ALPHA)_** _(Optional)_ Whether to require `@enumType` on all exported enums and string literal unions. - When true, missing `@enumType` tags on exported enums/unions will be reported - When false (default), only invalid usage is reported


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
